annexes

Class GestionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • annexes.GestionClient

  • public class GestionClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class GestionClient manage all subscriptions of the Broker, it's confine in this class and it use a concurrent hashmap in order to access the client information.
    Author:
    Group LAMA
